product_name: Merrell Siren Sport 2 Waterproof Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: The Merrell Siren Sport 2 waterproof hiking shoes supply plenty of support, breathability and comfort for your adventures. Synthetic leather uppers are supple, lightweight and durable; nylon mesh panels increase breathability, reduce weight and improve flexibility. Waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. Polyester mesh linings feature AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment to help deter odor development. Padded tongues relieve lace pressure and gussets help keep debris out; heel and tongue loops aid entry. Washable and removable OrthoLite(R) foam insoles enhance comfort. Q-Form(TM) comfort EVA midsoles help maintain foot alignment and control pronation; Air Cushion(R) heel pockets in midsoles absorb shock. Molded nylon arch shanks stabilize and support feet on uneven terrain. Merrell Siren Sport 2 waterproof hiking shoes feature Vibram(R) Mermaid sole with TC5+ rubber outsoles to provide amazing traction and excellent durability.
short_description: The Merrell Siren Sport 2 waterproof hiking shoes supply plenty of support, breathability and comfort for your adventures.
